meanings.sent1: My small toy is losable if I don't keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The keys are losable, so I always put them in the same spot.
meanings.sent3: I hope my homework isn't losable like my socks always are!
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as losable as a balloon in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The fragile glass ornaments were losable with one wrong move.

meanings.sent1: The important document is losable if not properly stored.
meanings.sent2: The ring is losable, so she wears it on a chain around her neck.
meanings.sent3: His train of thought seemed losable as he rambled on.
meanings.sent4: The fragile trust between them was as losable as a delicate thread.
meanings.sent5: The map was losable in the vast wilderness without a compass.
